question: A drive against the usage of e-cigarettes is being carried out in which Indian State?
explanation: Haryana Police is carrying out a month-long special drive. The drive will last till 10 December. The drive aims to check the availability and usage of e-cigarettes and all other forms of electronic nicotine delivery systems across Haryana. The move comes after the announcement of the Central government that recently prohibited e-cigarettes through the promulgation of the Prohibition of E-Cigarettes.
